page.title: 09BESTWOOD TOURISM,TRADE.
page.content: There is one shop in the village,which is a general grocers.There is a sand quarry to the east of the village which is now a dumping area for refuse.Lorries going through the village add to the traffic problem and pollution. {TOURISM Bestwood is beginning a new phase in its history as a tourist attraction. The Leen valley has been turned into a country park with lakes and walks.The old engine house has been taken over by the county council and is to be a museum.To the east is Bestwood Country Park, with horse trails and walks.The old Alexandra Lodge is the rangers' headquarters. There are plans to convert a classroom in the village school into a resources classroom for the country park.
